meanings.definition: A lively Spanish dance in duple time.
meanings.sent1: The pasodoble filled the dance floor with energy and rhythm.
meanings.sent2: The dancers moved gracefully to the beat of the pasodoble.
meanings.sent3: Everyone at the party joined in the pasodoble, creating a joyful atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The pasodoble was like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day, lifting everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant sounds of the pasodoble echoed through the room, captivating all who listened.

meanings.definition: A piece of music for this dance.
meanings.sent1: The band played a lively pasodoble that had everyone tapping their feet.
meanings.sent2: The pasodoble music was so catchy that it stayed in my head all day.
meanings.sent3: Listening to the pasodoble made me want to get up and dance around the room.
meanings.sent4: The pasodoble music was a whirlwind of emotions, taking the listeners on a musical journey.
meanings.sent5: The intricate melodies of the pasodoble intertwined beautifully, creating a symphony of sound.
